name: Push The Box (itch) (ShrihanSingh)
description:
Welcome to Push The Box

It's Like Sokoban where you have to move boxes into a goal.

Sorry about no web build. The project uses a GLES3 renderer however Godot recommends a GLES2 renderer for web builds. So sorry.

Note: I don't have a Mac or a Linux Computer. But if you have one, please try it out because I don't know if it works. Tell in the comments if it works or not.
